Title: Zettai Karen Children: Oobanburumai! Natsuko to Hotaru no B.A.B.E.L. Tsuushin
Description:
['A recap special (episode 39.5) of Zettai Karen Children.', '
', '
', '
', '
Narrated by "The Double Face" (Nowaki Hotaru and Tokiwa Natsuko), the episode introduces all the characters in B.A.B.E.L. with their abilities and roles etc. It also shows various facilities and places in B.A.B.E.L that have appeared in the story.']
Related: ['Adaptation: Boku no Kanojo ga Majimesugiru Shojo Bitch na Ken', 'Other: Boku no Kanojo ga Majimesugiru Sho-bitch na Ken']
Characters: ['Tokiwa, Natsuko', 'Nowaki, Hotaru', 'Hyoubu, Kyousuke', 'Akashi, Kaoru', 'Sannomiya, Shiho', 'Nogami, Aoi', 'Minamoto, Kouichi', 'Umegae, Naomi', 'Sakaki, Shuuji', 'Tsubomi, Fujiko']
Voices: ['Nakao, Eri', 'Satou, Rina', 'Yusa, Kouji', 'Hirano, Aya', 'Tomatsu, Haruka', 'Shiraishi, Ryouko', 'Nakamura, Yuuichi', 'Fujimura, Ayumi', 'Taniyama, Kishou', 'Yukana']
